bucketName.description: A name for the associated Amazon S3 bucket.

bucketPrefix.description: The object key for the destination bucket in which Amazon AppFlow places the files.

clusterIdentifier.description: The unique ID that's assigned to an Amazon Redshift cluster.

dataApiRoleArn.description: ARN of the IAM role that permits AppFlow to access the database through Data API.

databaseName.description: The name of an Amazon Redshift database.

databaseUrl.description: The JDBC URL of the Amazon Redshift cluster.
